class.name: MediaPipeObjectDetector
class.description: MediaPipe vision task for performing object detection on the given image.

method.name: detect
method.description: Performs object detection on [param image]. Only use this method when the task is initialized with [constant MediaPipeVisionTask.RUNNING_MODE_IMAGE].

method.name: detect_async
method.description: Sends [param image] to perform object detection. Only use this method when the task is initialized with [constant MediaPipeVisionTask.RUNNING_MODE_LIVE_STREAM].

method.name: detect_video
method.description: Performs object detection on video frame [param image]. Only use this method when the task is initialized with [constant MediaPipeVisionTask.RUNNING_MODE_VIDEO].

signal.name: result_callback
signal.description: Emitted when object detector initialized with [constant MediaPipeVisionTask.RUNNING_MODE_LIVE_STREAM] returns detection result.
